subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: another lengthy post about ebay in answer to margaret
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_f118f78d-7742-40c8-afb5-6faff7acf25a_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Margaret,
 
In my initial reply I voiced my disdain for low lives that tak=
e advantage of unwary people
but did not advocate any action by any researc=
hers on this board.
 
My goal is not just pacifism for it's own sake, belie=
ve me any of the old timers here can attest to my temper.
My concern is for=
 the negative disruption in the energy flow of the communication.
I think t=
hat following the example of "turn the other cheek" will be very well recei=
ved on the other side and therefore 
contribute to strengthening the bridge=
.
 
In the past couple of days I know Kristin has received messages about t=
he seven and the circle, 
these are metaphors for peace, harmony and cooper=
ation of energies within the communication.
 
It is not the first time we h=
ave received messages with these examples, I personally have received numer=
ous 
messages pertaining to circle, circles and the power of seven. It has =
been contemplated in length here more than once.
 
I have, through interpre=
tation of communication over a long period of time, come to PERSONALLY beli=
eve that the urgence of 
harmony and positive energy is the fertilizer of t=
he growth of our communication with the spirit world.
 
I'm sorry, I drifte=
d off the subject at hand, but my reason is relevant to this commentary. 
T=
aking any action against this ebay fool will first and foremost serve our e=
go's and secondly
may help to provide information to unwary buyers that is =
contrary to what this thief is putting out.
 
But could that not be accompl=
ished through other venues that would help to educate many more people that=

are would be box researchers and do not look to ebay as a source for an RS=
 hack. But are seeking general knowledge.
 
And Margaret to thine own self =
be true, when this was brought up my first reaction was to figure out a way=
 to sabotage
this guy's business venture. After thinking it over and asking=
 myself what the first reason for doing that would be. My answer
Was, to ge=
t this asshole that is exploiting something that I hold very dear, and in t=
urn help to steer unaware buyers away from getting screwed.
 
But still my =
initial and primal reason was to inflict some sort of punishment on a perso=
n that I felt was unscrupulous. And I decided that this was
a negative emot=
ion and would generate negative energy, no matter how I tried to convince m=
yself it was in the name of justice.
 
That goes without even mentioning th=
e fact that we are not the say all and do all of this research. There are o=
ther entities involved that I would think 
have better influential power th=
an we do. If they want it stopped they will find a way to stop it. I know w=
hat your going to say, maybe we are the 
tools they are using to stop this =
injustice. That may very well be, and if so then that is the way it will pl=
ay out.
 
I think you mistake what I am implying. I am not saying do nothin=
g, quite the opposite. It is actually our duty to do something. All I'm say=
ing is there 
are alternative ways to educate unwary possible researchers t=
hat would be 100% positive and not entail any type of stone throwing tactic=
s.
 
I have said my piece now at the expense of boring everyone to death. S=
o I will see how this unfolds, and during my daily session will inquire abo=
ut how our friends feel about it.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.comFrom: ITCdeadpeople@...: Tue, 8 Apr 2008 01:20:11 +0000=
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: My opinion on what should be done about ebay_I know =
it's long but please rea




Hi Bruce. I don't see this so much as an assau=
lt on anyone, as it is simply bringing awareness into a forum (ebay) where =
it is desperately needed. Was it not you who recently stated sellers who ta=
ke advantage of others in this way are "no more than thieves without guns" =
and "should not be patronized no matter the circumstances." You have charac=
terized them as "wolves" and "demons" but now are saying "do nothing." Whic=
h, honestly, I could understand if my suggestion was coming from a place of=
 vengeance. It is not.THIS IS ABOUT EDUCATION FIRST AND FOREMOST, and stand=
ing up for those who are, unknowingly, being taken advantage of. The byprod=
uct of providing this education will be allowing consumers to make an infor=
med decision and if that hurts the sales of unscrupulous sellers, then so b=
e it. Ann has just echoed some of my remarks in earlier posts in support of=
 sellers rights to take advantage of the market ... that some people may fi=
nd it's worth it to pay more to someone to receive a previously hacked unit=
. I would venture to guess, this educational information will A) help preve=
nt those who are capable of doing the hack themselves from being duped, and=
 B) force sellers who do offer pre-hacked units to do so for a more 'reason=
able' fee. This is neither spiteful nor aggressive, and it's certainly not =
any kind of vengeance driven on my part. It's standing up for the uninforme=
d, leveling the playing field for sellers, and it's bringing more people th=
e knowledge that doing 'box' research is not an exclusive club that only th=
e rich can take part in (and given the pricing on the bids for these units,=
 people are under the false assumption that you have a pay a high price to =
get your hands on a limited resource, when that simply is not the case.)I c=
an see nothing but positive benefits coming from educating people about the=
ir options.Margaret--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" <paranormalin=
vestigating@...> wrote:>> > Hi Everyone,> > I have been reading the back an=
d forth posts about ideas on how to > deal with the individual selling the =
hacks on ebay for inflated > prices.> > I posted my thoughts on that indivi=
dual yesterday. I would now like > to render my opinion as to the subject o=
f what we or anyone can do > about it.> > My suggestion is DO NOTHING! Now =
before everybody's jaw hits the > floor, hear me out.> > A couple of months=
 ago I would have been the one to lead the charge > in the assault on this =
guy in the name of box justice.> > I can now say with confidence, That is n=
ot the way to handle it.> Let me explain why I believe this way. Without go=
ing into a lot of > detail, I was a tough street kid that grew up on the st=
reets of > Brooklyn, I also served my country proudly for six years as a us=
 army > green beret, then to a career as a FDNY Fireman whose heart and > h=
ealth where both broken at 911.> > My point is, I have always lived my life=
 believing that anything I > did not agree with or that did not fit my sens=
e of right and wrong> whether it be right or wrong, could be easily solved =
with aggression > of some kind.> > It took a long while and much sole searc=
hing and a lot of > communication interpretation from our friends on the ot=
her side.> But I have come to learn that aggressive action in any form is >=
 detrimental to the harmony and peace of the whole involved.> > Guy's like =
this guy on ebay do not and can not last in the face of > good and well int=
entioned people that are here and willing and trying > to get the word of t=
his miraculous research and spirit communication > out to as many people as=
 are in need or want of it.> > That is how we can stop people like this bot=
tom feeder. By spreading > the knowledge of this research from one person t=
o the next. Our > friends have stated time and time again that any negative=
 energy will > be detrimental to the communication and the research, and po=
sitive > harmony and vibration will serve to strengthen the bridge between =
our > worlds.> > So even if you are not religious and do not believe in Jes=
us Christ > as I do, these words ring true no matter what context they come=
 from> this wisdom was spoken by my lord two thousand years ago.> > "do not=
 check the splinter in your brothers eye, until you have > checked the plan=
k in your own"> > Truthfully, anything we could do to sway this individuals=
 sale of > these boxes would be minimal. Negativity and greed always find a=
 > crack to seep through.> > My suggestion is lets try a little harder to s=
pread the word of the > research and educate individuals that are or may be=
come interested, > through all the various outlets available to us on the w=
eb concerning > the paranormal research community. There are endless chat b=
oards, > groups and forums plus websites and word of mouth. > Instead of tr=
ying to stop this idiot from defrauding innocent > unknowledgable people. L=
ets make sure the knowledge is out there for > them and we are here to help=
 them and guy's like Mr. ebay will > disappear on their own.> > And we will=
 not have expended an ounce of negative energy in the > process.> That's ho=
w I feel, but that's just me.> > Bruce>

Taking any action against this=

may hel=
p to provide information to unwary buyers that is contrary to what this thi=
ef is putting out.<BR>

But could that not be accomplished throug=
h other venues that would help to educate many more people that<BR>
are wou=
ld be box researchers and do not look to ebay as a source for an RS hack. B=

 <BR>
And Margaret to thine own =
self be true, when this was brought up my first reaction was to figure out =
a way to sabotage<BR>
this guy's business venture. After thinking it over a=
nd asking myself what the first reason for doing that would be. My answer<B=
R>
Was, to get this asshole that is exploiting something that I hold very d=
ear, and in turn help to steer unaware buyers away from getting screwed.<BR=
>
 <BR>
But still my initial and primal reason was to inflict some sor=
t of punishment on a person that I felt was unscrupulous. And I decided tha=
t this was<BR>
a negative emotion and would generate negative energy, no ma=
tter how I tried to convince myself it was in the name of justice.<BR>
&nbs=
p;<BR>
That goes without even mentioning the fact that we are not the say a=
ll and do all of this research. There are other entities involved that I wo=
uld think <BR>
have better influential power than we do. If they want it st=
opped they will find a way to stop it. I know what your going to say, maybe=
 we are the <BR>
tools they are using to stop this injustice. That may very=

I=
 think you mistake what I am implying. I am not saying do nothing, quite th=
e opposite. It is actually our duty to do something. All I'm saying is ther=

are alternative ways to educate unwary possible researchers that wou=
ld be 100% positive and not entail any type of stone throwing tactics.<BR>
=
 <BR>
I have said my piece now at the expense of boring everyone to de=
ath. So I will see how this unfolds, and during my daily session will inqui=
